<wsdl:documentation><![CDATA[<table> <tr> <td><b>Summary:</b></td> <td>This method allow to thrid party systems add and invoice to the CenPOS Ebpp system</td> </tr> <tr> <td><b>Parameters:</></td> <td>addEbppInvoiceResultVO: The request of the Web Method. Contains information about invoice, invoice line item, customer and authentication</td> </tr> <tr> <td><b>Returns:</b></td> <td>AddEbppInvoiceResultVO. Contains information about the operation result. also PaymentURL: represents the URL generated by the systyem in which customer can pay their invoices</td> </tr> </table>]]></wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:AddEbppInvoiceSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:AddEbppInvoiceSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SetInvoiceCancellationNotes"> <wsdl:documentation><![CDATA[<table> <tr> <td><b>Summary:</b></td> <td>This method allow to third party systems set a cancell status to the given invoices.</td> </tr> <tr> <td><b>Parameters:</></td> <td>setCancellationRequestVO: The request of the Web Method. Contains information about invoice or invoices to be cancelled and comment for thoses cancellations</td> </tr> <tr> <td><b>Returns:</b></td> <td>ResultVO Contains information about the operation result</td> </tr> </table>]]></wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:SetInvoiceCancellationNotesSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:SetInvoiceCancellationNotesSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SetInvoiceExternalPayments"> <wsdl:documentation><![CDATA[<table> <tr> <td><b>Summary:</b></td> <td>This method allow to third party systems to set a partial or completed payment of invoices. thoses payments which are collected outside of ebpp systems and must be notify to the ebpp using this method.</td> </tr> <tr> <td><b>Parameters:</></td> <td>externalPaymentRequestVO: The request of the web method contains information about the user credential. invoice information and payment data</td> </tr> <tr> <td><b>Returns:</b></td> <td>AddEbppInvoiceResultVO. Contains information about the operation result. also PaymentURL: represents the URL generated by the systyem in which customer can pay their invoices</td> </tr> </table>]]></wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:SetInvoiceExternalPaymentsSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:SetInvoiceExternalPaymentsSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetInvoicePaymentInformation"> <wsdl:input message="tns:GetInvoicePaymentInformationSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:GetInvoicePaymentInformationSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SetProcessingUser"> <wsdl:input message="tns:SetProcessingUserSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:SetProcessingUserSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SetUserEbppPrivileges"> <wsdl:input message="tns:SetUserEbppPrivilegesSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:SetUserEbppPrivilegesSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SetMerchantConfiguration"> <wsdl:input message="tns:SetMerchantConfigurationSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:SetMerchantConfigurationSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SetCustomerOption"> <wsdl:input message="tns:SetCustomerOptionSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:SetCustomerOptionSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SetExternalPayments"> <wsdl:documentation><![CDATA[<table> <tr> <td><b>Summary:</b></td> <td>This method allow to third party systems to set a partial or completed payment of invoices. thoses payments which are collected outside of ebpp systems and must be notify to the ebpp using this method.</td> </tr> <tr> <td><b>Parameters:</></td> <td>externalPaymentRequestVO: The request of the web method contains information about the user credential. invoice information and payment data</td> </tr> <tr> <td><b>Returns:</b></td> <td>AddEbppInvoiceResultVO. Contains information about the operation result. also PaymentURL: represents the URL generated by the systyem in which customer can pay their invoices</td> </tr> </table>]]></wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:SetExternalPaymentsSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:SetExternalPaymentsSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="UpdateEbppInvoice"> <wsdl:documentation><![CDATA[<table> <tr> <td><b>Summary:</b></td> <td>This method allow to thrid party systems to update an invoice to the CenPOS Ebpp system</td> </tr> <tr> <td><b>Parameters:</></td> <td>updateEbppInvoiceResultVO: The request of the Web Method. Contains information about invoice, invoice line item, customer and authentication</td> </tr> <tr> <td><b>Returns:</b></td> <td>UpdateEbppInvoiceResultVO. Contains information about the operation result. also PaymentURL: represents the URL generated by the systyem in which customer can pay their invoices</td> </tr> </table>]]></wsdl:documentation>
